name: Rails Autoscale Demo
description: A barebones Rails app, built for exploring the Rails Autoscale Heroku add-on

JOB_BACKEND.description: Choose how you process background jobs (sidekiq/resque/delayed_job/que).

BUNDLE_WITHOUT.description: This is used by the Ruby buildpack to avoid installing unwanted job backends. By default we're only installing Sidekiq.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of Puma processes (concurrent requests) per dyno.

RAILS_MAX_THREADS.description: The number of Puma threads and Sidekiq concurrency.
